title: Quick Tomato Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta. Saut√© garlic in olive oil, add tomatoes, and simmer. Mix sauce with pasta, garnish with basil.

title: Simple Cheese Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper. Pour into a pan, add cheese, and cook until set.

title: Easy Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: Stir-fry chicken and ginger. Add broccoli and carrots, then soy sauce. Cook until tender.
